data.message: Hello Facebook How do I confirm my account blue slash

replies.message: Hey Omar. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2e1h1pT. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://bit.ly/2e1h1WG. Thank you. -Hannah
